rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3148}

unitName: Japanese studies advanced: Literature and film
description: This unit is designed to develop students' Japanese language skills to an advanced level, while introducing them to Japanese literature and film, as well as approaches to literary translation and subtitling. Students will develop reading and listening skills, research skills using Japanese resources, discussion skills, and will use a variety of Japanese media, including the Internet. Writing skills to be developed include translation, summary, synthesis and argument in essay writing. Teaching materials will relate to Japanese literature, focusing on modern and contemporary Japanese literature and film.
